item.description:
1st Meetup Location - 1550 West Main Road, Melville RI  02871 at 0730am

2nd Meetup Location - 1001 South Street, Wrentham MA  02093 at 0830am

3rd Meetup Location  -129 Whalon Street, Fitchburg, MA 01420-7139 (A & E Route 2 Mobil)  at 0930am

its about 50min between the first and second meetup locations, and another 50min or so to the 3rd meetup location.  NESB will meet with Chris's group in Wrentham where he will lead us up to Fitchburg to meet with Boston Tier 1.

Total Ride Time = 4hr 50min + stops  We should be home by dinner.

Please include in your RSVP which location you will meet us so we are not waiting.

Hello everyone, for those of us who like riding and staying DRY (lol). this ride is going to be an ALL DAY RIDE. Chris and I worked on a map and it came out pretty sick! there is a small surprise at the last part of the ride (no its not on the map we posted). we'll stop for lunch at Pedrin's dairy farm. this is going to be a great ride.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Here is the map for the 2nd part of the ride: 
View Larger Map
item.how_to_find_us: The Bad Ass Biker Dudes outside of Dunkin Donuts sipping Vanilla Chai Latte
item.name: Western Mass Ride!! (Dry Edition) w/Boston Tier 1 Riders
